Read the file 2024_CSN_Fraud, Identity Theft, and Other Reports by Military Consumers.csv into a dataframe.
Isolate the slice of rows (index 7 to 13) that contains the fraud-loss table by military branch.
Take the first row of that slice as the true header, convert it to a Python list, and set it as the dataframe’s column names.
Drop the header row from the data so that only data records remain.
Loop through each branch row, strip the "$" and comma characters from the ‘Median Fraud Loss’ string and convert it to an integer.
Keep track of the branch whose median fraud loss is the largest while iterating.
Print the name of the branch with the maximum median fraud loss.
